section.heading: Board of Veterinary Medicine executive director.
section.text: The Mayor shall appoint an executive director to implement and administer the orders of the Board of Veterinary Medicine in accordance with this chapter and the rules and regulations issued pursuant to this chapter.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Mar. 26, 2014, D.C. Law 20-96, ยง 102(i), 61 DCR 1184

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: The 2014 amendment by D.C. Law 20-96 added this section.
